en.about_intro:
CIN FRAMEWORK is not just a framework.
It is an integrated system, a diabolical engineering entity that brings together all the tools, libraries, and technologies that any programmer needs to create a professional web application with global standards, without limits, without restrictions, and without complexity.
en.about_description:
It is not like other boring frameworks... but an aggressive electronic system that improves performance, controls architecture, and unleashes the power of execution speed and development flexibility.
It is designed to work in any server environment, giving you absolute stability and aggressive security that we call:
"Aggressive Security" ‚Äî where we don't just defend... we attack.
en.about_goal_content:
CIN was built to provide an integrated web development environment that knows no collapse and accepts no delay.
Our goal is to create an electronic world not limited by PHP structure, but harnesses it for your benefit.
Aggressive speed, deep integration, comprehensive analysis, diabolical customization...
All of this comes to you on a platter of ease, through CIN.

With CIN... you won't just develop an application, you'll enter the era of the fourth generation of the web ‚Äì Web 4.
en.about_target_content:
Whether you are:

‚Ä¢ A beginner who has never set foot in programming,
‚Ä¢ Or a professional programmer looking for more stable ground,
‚Ä¢ Or a huge company that wants an electronic weapon that guarantees its security...

CIN is designed for you.

Smooth learning, detailed explanation, videos, articles, and direct support that guides you step by step.
From backend to frontend... from zero to full stack, without pain or waiting.
en.about_comparison_title: üÜö Is CIN like Laravel or Symfony?
en.about_comparison_content:
CIN is incomparable.
Because it is not a framework, but a complete web application in itself.
All you need is to change the content and identity...
And you won't need prior knowledge of programming, or even the arts of system architecture.

CIN = Code In Nothing

Code is nothing... the system is everything.
en.about_philosophy_content:
We are in an era where those who are late are punished.
Therefore, CIN believes that every programmer has the right to own a giant infrastructure that serves their interests and gives them steel stability.

We do not monopolize code.
We do not hide knowledge.
But we give it to you on a platter of fire... to build what you want, and dominate as you wish.
en.about_feature_1_desc: You will understand everything quickly, and build faster than you imagine.
en.about_feature_2_desc: Whatever your server environment, CIN adapts.
en.about_feature_3_desc: No room for vulnerabilities... CIN attacks before being attacked.
en.about_feature_4_desc: Speed at the heart of architecture.
en.about_feature_5_desc: Everything is calculated, even your Google results.
en.about_feature_6_desc: No testing, just launch. We are in the field from the first moment.
en.about_future_title: üß† The Future: Where Every New Developer is Born
en.about_future_content:
We see CIN as a source of power for every ambitious young person who did not have the opportunity to study engineering or complex programming systems.
With CIN, you won't need prior knowledge, or certificates.
Just follow the instructions, and own the interface, background, and beating heart of your website.
en.about_final_content:
We use local self-sufficiency technology and aggressive security.
And with us... the new phase of control begins.
en.privacy_intro: Within the CIN FRAMEWORK, we place utmost importance on respecting your privacy and protecting your personal data. We fully recognize that the information you provide to us is not just data, but an extension of your digital existence, and our responsibility towards you requires complete transparency regarding how this information is used, its purpose, and the parties that may access it.
en.privacy_description: This page aims to clarify the privacy policy we follow, the measures taken to protect your information, and the options available to you regarding your data. By using our website or any of our services, you implicitly agree to all the practices and policies outlined below.
en.privacy_section_1_content:
We collect multiple types of data when you interact with our platform, including the following:

1. Information you provide voluntarily:
When registering on the site or subscribing to our newsletter or contacting us, we may ask for identifying information such as: full name, email address, job title, company name, country, or other details.

2. Technical information collected automatically:
‚Ä¢ Internet Protocol (IP) address
‚Ä¢ Device type and operating system
‚Ä¢ Browser type and version
‚Ä¢ Pages you visit, duration of stay, and access dates
‚Ä¢ User behavior within the site

3. Cookies:
We use advanced tracking technologies to analyze user behavior within the platform, customize their experience, and improve our services based on actual interaction.
en.privacy_section_2_title: Second: How We Use This Data?
en.privacy_section_2_content:
We use the data we collect within the CIN FRAMEWORK for the following purposes:

‚Ä¢ To improve user experience and develop content that aligns with visitors' interests
‚Ä¢ To provide customized services based on user type (beginner, professional, company)
‚Ä¢ To respond to inquiries and technical or administrative support
‚Ä¢ To send updates, announcements, educational articles, or technical offers via email
‚Ä¢ For internal analytical purposes including performance tracking and evaluating platform strengths and weaknesses
‚Ä¢ To ensure security and prevent any unauthorized or illegal activity
en.privacy_section_3_content:
We take information security very seriously. We have integrated a set of strict security measures ‚Äî technical and organizational ‚Äî to protect user data from any unauthorized access, modification, loss, or destruction, including but not limited to:

‚Ä¢ Using strong encryption protocols for data transmission
‚Ä¢ Firewalls and anti-intrusion systems
‚Ä¢ Proactive monitoring systems for abnormal behavior within the system
‚Ä¢ Limited permissions within the backend infrastructure, so access is only available to authorized personnel
en.privacy_section_4_title: Fourth: Data Sharing with Third Parties
en.privacy_section_4_content:
In general, we do not sell, rent, or share your personal information with any third party. However, we may share some data in the following cases:

‚Ä¢ With companies or providers we work with to improve services (with full commitment not to use them for commercial purposes)
‚Ä¢ If legally required based on an official request from competent authorities
‚Ä¢ To protect our rights or enforce terms of use or to detect fraudulent activities or security threats
en.privacy_section_5_content:
We give you complete control over your data. You have the right to:

‚Ä¢ Request a copy of your personal data stored with us
‚Ä¢ Request correction of any error or modification of your data
‚Ä¢ Request permanent deletion of all your data
‚Ä¢ Withdraw your consent to use your data at any time

You can exercise these rights by contacting us directly via the following email:
üìß support@cin-framework.com
en.privacy_section_6_content:
We use cookies to provide a better and more personalized experience, and these files include:

‚Ä¢ Session Cookies
‚Ä¢ Analytics Cookies
‚Ä¢ Customization and preference files

You can control cookies through your browser settings, but disabling them may affect some site features.
en.privacy_section_7_content: We retain your data as long as it is necessary for the purposes for which it was collected, or as long as your account is active, or as required by law. After that, the data is permanently deleted or made untraceable.
en.privacy_section_8_content:
We may update this policy at any time, and your continued use of the site after modifications constitutes implicit consent to the modified version. We recommend reviewing this page periodically.

Last update to this policy: August 6, 2025
en.privacy_section_9_content:
For any inquiry, complaint, or request related to your data, you can contact us via the official email:
üìß privacy@cin-framework.com

Or via the general technical support email:
üìß contact@cin-framework.com
en.privacy_final_content:
We at CIN FRAMEWORK believe that knowledge is power‚Ä¶
But data ‚Äî when used intelligently ‚Äî is the key to control.
And everyone who enters our digital domain, we grant them apparent security‚Ä¶ and control them in secret.
en.reporting_intro_content: This page serves as the official reference for reporting any unacceptable behavior or violations of community rules within the CIN Framework community. These guidelines are directly linked to our Code of Conduct and provide a clear pathway for addressing concerns.
en.reporting_issues_title: Types of Issues You Can Report
en.reporting_issues_intro: You can report the following types of issues:
en.reporting_issue_2: Posting inappropriate content or content outside the community scope
en.reporting_issue_3: Behaviors that hinder development or collaboration
en.reporting_issue_4: Violations of security or privacy policies
en.reporting_channels_intro: You can report issues through the following official channels:
en.reporting_content_intro: When submitting a report, please include the following information:
en.reporting_content_1: Name or identity of the person or entity (if available)
en.reporting_content_2: Clear and detailed description of the incident
en.reporting_content_3: Date, time, and location (or link to the incident if online)
en.reporting_confidentiality_content: We are committed to maintaining the confidentiality of the reporter's identity. Any report is handled with complete confidentiality, and the reporter's identity will not be disclosed without their consent or unless required by law.
en.reporting_process_intro: Our report processing follows these steps:
en.reporting_step_3: Appropriate action taken (warning, ban, other measures)
en.reporting_retention_content: Report records are retained for 12 months before being permanently deleted, unless extended retention is required for ongoing investigations or legal requirements.
en.reporting_updates_content: These guidelines may be updated at any time. We recommend reviewing this page periodically for any changes.
en.reporting_contact_content: For any questions about these reporting guidelines, please contact us at support@cin-framework.com
en.faq_subtitle: Find answers to the most common questions about CIN Framework
en.faq_a1: CIN Framework is an advanced PHP-based framework designed to simplify the creation of high-performance, dynamic systems and websites, focusing on local self-sufficiency, aggressive security, and full developer flexibility.
en.faq_q2: 2. What are the main features of CIN Framework?
en.faq_feature_2: Full support for building complex systems
en.faq_feature_3: Aggressive security to protect against vulnerabilities and attacks
en.faq_feature_4: Integrated CLI tools for complete project control
en.faq_feature_5: Easy management and installation of CIN libraries
en.faq_q3: 3. Can CIN Framework be used with other frameworks?
en.faq_a3: Yes, CIN Framework can be integrated with other systems and frameworks, but its true power shines when used as a standalone platform.
en.faq_a4: CIN CLI is a command-line tool dedicated to managing and installing the framework, installing libraries, repairing the system, and configuring new applications. It handles all commands within the CIN environment.
en.faq_a5: CIN Library is a collection of ready-to-use libraries specifically designed for seamless integration with CIN Framework, accelerating project development.
en.faq_step_1: Download CIN CLI from the releases page
en.faq_step_2: Install the framework using CIN CLI commands
en.faq_q7: 7. How can I request support or report an issue?
en.faq_a7: You can contact us via email at support@cin-framework.com or check our reporting guidelines.
en.faq_info_message: If you can't find the answer you're looking for, feel free to contact our support team at support@cin-framework.com
en.cin_cli_subtitle: A comprehensive command-line tool specifically designed to manage the CIN Framework with ease and speed.
en.core_capabilities_desc: CIN-CLI provides a flexible command-line interface that empowers developers with:
en.core_feature_1: Download and install CIN Framework automatically
en.core_feature_2: Update framework to latest versions seamlessly
en.core_feature_4: Remove framework when no longer needed
en.advanced_feature_1: Download and manage official CIN libraries
en.advanced_feature_2: Fix the system when any issues occur
en.architecture_desc: CIN-CLI is fully responsible for all commands in the CIN system, engineered to deliver:
en.additional_feature_1: Automated Testing: Generate and run comprehensive test suites for your applications
en.additional_feature_2: Performance Optimization: Built-in tools for code analysis and performance enhancement
en.additional_feature_3: Documentation Generation: Automatically create detailed documentation for your projects
en.additional_feature_4: Security Scanning: Integrated security checks and vulnerability assessments
en.additional_feature_5: Deployment Automation: Streamlined deployment processes for various hosting environments
en.installation_desc: Then place your version in a main website folder, i.e., in the location where you want to build your web application, such as placing it in C:\xampp\htdocs or any location you prefer.

en.cli_update_framework_desc: Update CIN Framework to the latest version

en.v220_crp_command_desc: Create a new PHP page with CIN template. The page will be created in the same directory as cin-cli.exe with the default CIN Framework structure.
en.v220_rep_command_desc: Remove an existing PHP page from the current directory.
en.v220_security_note_desc: Page names cannot contain path separators (/, \) or file extensions. All operations are restricted to the cin-cli.exe directory for security.
en.v220_php_page_creation_title: PHP Page Creation: Added crp [pagename] command for creating PHP pages
en.v220_php_creation_feature_1: Creates PHP files with CIN Framework template in executable directory
en.v220_php_creation_feature_2: Includes default CIN Framework boilerplate code
en.v220_php_creation_feature_3: Automatic file validation and error handling
en.v220_php_creation_feature_4: Prevents path traversal and ensures secure file creation
en.v220_php_page_removal_title: PHP Page Removal: Added rep [pagename] command for removing PHP pages
en.v220_php_removal_feature_1: Safe deletion of PHP files from executable directory
en.v220_path_validation_title: Path Validation: Strict validation prevents directory traversal attacks
en.v220_file_name_sanitization_title: File Name Sanitization: Only simple names allowed (no paths or extensions)
en.v220_secure_file_operations_title: Secure File Operations: All file operations restricted to executable directory
en.v220_input_validation_title: Input Validation: Comprehensive validation of user input parameters
en.v220_command_integration_title: Command Integration: Seamless integration with existing CLI command system
en.v220_error_handling_title: Error Handling: Comprehensive error handling for all file operations
en.v220_user_feedback_title: User Feedback: Clear success/error messages with color coding
en.v220_file_management_title: File Management: Intelligent file existence checking and validation
en.v220_help_integration_title: Help Integration: New commands added to help system with clear descriptions
en.v220_color_coding_title: Color Coding: Consistent color scheme for success, error, and info messages
en.v220_usage_examples_title: Usage Examples: Clear usage instructions and examples for both commands
en.v220_file_location_display_title: File Location Display: Shows exact file paths for created/removed files
en.v220_security_restriction_1: Path separators (/ \) are not allowed in page names
en.v220_security_restriction_3: All operations restricted to executable directory only

en.v210_framework_storage_feature_1: Framework zip files are now saved in .cin-cli/cin_v directory for future reference
en.v210_framework_storage_feature_2: Zip files are retained after extraction for backup and rollback purposes
en.v210_framework_storage_feature_3: Enhanced download path management and storage organization
en.v210_framework_storage_feature_4: Improved framework version tracking and management

en.v210_windows_security_feature_2: Other platforms marked as relatively less secure due to limited security implementation

en.v210_windows_security_feature_4: Enhanced Windows-specific security validations and protections

en.v210_download_system_feature_2: Improved zip file management and retention policies

en.v210_download_system_feature_4: Added confirmation messages for storage operations

en.v210_limited_support: Limited Support: Other platforms - Basic functionality only
en.cin_framework_1_description: CIN Framework is an advanced web framework built on PHP, designed to push the boundaries of modern web development.
en.cin_framework_1_repo_description: This is the official website for the CIN Framework, providing comprehensive information about the framework.
en.cin_framework_1_storage_note: To download and install the CIN Framework, you must use the official CIN CLI tool.
en.cin_framework_1_cli_description: To download and install the CIN Framework, you must use the official CIN CLI tool.
en.cin_framework_1_detailed_instructions: For detailed installation instructions and CLI usage, explore the documentation on this website.
en.cin_framework_1_getting_started_descript: Ready to start your journey with CIN Framework? Follow our comprehensive getting started guide.
en.cin_framework_1_release_notes_descriptio: Stay updated with the latest changes, improvements, and features in CIN Framework.
en.cin_framework_1_v200_welcome_message: This is the initial release of CIN Framework - Start CIN Framework.
en.cin_framework_1_v200_note_message: Start CIN Framework - This marks the beginning of our journey to revolutionize web development with PHP.
